snippet.title: Bromocriptine tablets or capsules
snippet.description: * Bromocriptine tablets or capsules Bromocriptine tablets or capsules What is this medicine? BROMOCRIPTINE (broe moe KRIP teen) is used to treat type 2 diabetes. It helps to control blood sugar. Treatment is combined with diet and exercise. This medicine may be used for oth...
